summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 46th Avenue Southwest from West Hinds Street to West Stevens Street; and certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 17002 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
